blocks.heading: Ship a SharePoint your people actually use
blocks.description: Your documents are scattered. Your teams are frustrated. Your SharePoint investment isn't delivering. SSW's SharePoint experts customize solutions that fit your business; not force your business to fit SharePoint.

blocks.heading: Why Most SharePoint Implementations Fail
blocks.description: Many organizations struggle with data scattered across disparate systems. While SharePoint aims to solve this, a default setup rarely suffices. We centralize your documents, data, and processes, enforcing information management policies and automating critical business workflows to boost efficiency across your entire organization.

features.heading: Modern intranets & team sites
features.description: Consistent hub navigation, branded themes, clear IA, and â€˜important placesâ€™ that help new starters and veterans find work fast.

features.heading: Process automation
features.description: Leave requests, expense claims, approvals. All the recurring processes implemented with lists, Power Automate, and Power Apps.

cards.heading: Team Collaboration Sites
cards.description: Create productive team sites for every project, department, and division. Share files, data, news, and resources with powerful collaboration tools that your teams will actually want to use.

cards.heading: Intranet Portals
cards.description: Build cohesive intranet sites that inform and engage employees. Share resources, applications, and company news in one centralized hub that drives organizational efficiency.

cards.heading: Enterprise Search
cards.description: Stop wasting hours searching for documents. Powerful search capabilities and intelligent discovery help your teams find information, expertise, and insights instantly.

blocks.heading: Tech wisdom from the trenches
blocks.body: At SSW, weâ€™ve been building enterprise projects for thirty years: We're thought leaders in software architecture, and document all our learning for free on the SSW Rules and SSW TV.

cards.heading: SharePoint Sites for Admins - Tips for Managing SharePoint with Warwick Leahy
cards.description: In the days of classic SharePoint, subsites were a popular way of organising your intranet. Modern SharePoint architecture leans toward a flatter hierarchy, where sub-sites are generally not recommended.

cards.altText: Why SharePoint Search is Awesome! How to use SharePoint Search | Jean Thirion
cards.heading: Why SharePoint Search is Awesome! How to use SharePoint Search | Jean Thirion
cards.description: See what makes SharePoint Search a powerful way to find anything throughout your organization.
